root.name: Kung Fu Panda 2: The Video Game
root.description: OverviewKung Fu Panda 2: The Video Game is a movie tie in developed by THQ. It follows the adventures of Po, a kung fu fighting panda voiced by Jack Black. He must free his village from evil crocodile warriors by using his deadly moves and humour.The game is relies on motion (for the 360, Wii and PS3 versions). You will face one enemy at a time. There are two phases in combat: attack and defend. Attack requires you to swing your arms and feet to beat up your opponent while defense requires you to make the desired movement on screen to doge and counter. You can also call in one of Po's friends for combo attacks.Po, enjoying some mini gamesThe game isn't all about fighting however as there are 3 types of mini games that you can play during down time. The first is a simplified version of Diner Dash where you must fling dishes at hungry customers. The second has Po going down a hill at high speeds while avoiding obstacles. The final mini game is a shooting gallery.
